name: Eddy Elfenbein
tweet: In August 1999, Red Hat IPO'd at $7 per share. It opened at $23. Four months later, it hit $150. When trading opened after 9/11, $RHT was at $2.40 per share. In June of this year, it climbed back to $177, then slid to $116 on Friday. IBM just said they're buying it for $190.
